TopicTitle: Why ksp website is offline and when 1.0 will be released?

Articles.Content: I hoped i will able to play 1.o today, i work most of the weak, today i have day-off and hoped to enjoy ksp

It's just after 2am where squad is based. I imagine that it'll be released (if all goes well) some time after they have breakfast. 

I'll have to wait until tomorrow.

Colonel Sandurz: Try here. Stop.

Dark Helmet: What the heck am I looking at? When does 1.0 finally drop?

Colonel Sandurz: Not now. You're looking at now, sir. Everything that happens now, is happening now.

Dark Helmet: What happened to patch day?

Colonel Sandurz: Won't happen until then.

Dark Helmet: When?

Colonel Sandurz: Then. We're at now now.

Dark Helmet: Go back to then.

Colonel Sandurz: When?

Dark Helmet: Now.

Colonel Sandurz: Now?

Dark Helmet: Now.

Colonel Sandurz: I can't.

Dark Helmet: Why?

Colonel Sandurz: Didn't happen yet.

Dark Helmet: When?

Colonel Sandurz: Then!

Dark Helmet: When will then be now?

Colonel Sandurz: *Soon*.

![vXjagiy.gif](http://i.imgur.com/vXjagiy.gif)

Lol, Whackjob NAILED it.

On a more serious note, threads like this are bad form. Please look around the forum for a bit before making a new thread - several threads already exist questioning the release time and addressing that the site is down (and it's not hard to guess why to begin with - they knew they'd need a buffed up server for the release).

That one cracked me up xD
They could just put up an ETA, like pretty much every other game release. Lots of them have a countdown timer...

2.3E guys, 2.3E ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
